name: Roity and its magical seeds
description:
============= Roity and its magical seeds =============

Help Roity save its forest!
Roity, a young raccoon, finds itself in a turmoil when monsters invade its forest.
Courageous and brave, it grabs its bag full of magic seeds, and goes to free its beloved woods!

============= A beautiful 2D Kirby-Inspired environment =============

- Discover 6 levels, drawn in a beautiful GameBoy style

- Throw up to 4 types of seed, fight enemies, collect strawberries and save the forest!

- Enjoy Roity's animation, music and sfx to the fullest!

============= How to play ? ==============

You can play directly in browser! If it doesn't work, sorry...we only have a windows build for now.

To play the windows build:

- Download the archive

- Launch 'Roity.exe'

The game supports keyboard AND gamepad.

============= Other game information =============

The game was made in 10 days by Florian Ortega and Yohann Degli-Esposti for the GJAM 10. The theme was 'plant' and we had to respect a 4-color palette, specific control schemes and do everything by ourselves.

Every asset was done during the jam
This includes:
- Text Font
- Graphics
- Code
- Music
- Sound Effects
